pages.text: $(o)Winged enables you to... well, graft magical wings onto your body. You can obtain Elytra like flight, or even more powerful flight, and keep it if you die. $(br2)It all starts by finding a Core of Zephyr in an End City, or repairing damaged ones found in dungeons.

pages.title: WING CRAFTING
pages.text: $(o)Once you have a Core of Zephyr, you'll need a Zephyr Workbench to craft one of dozens of wings to wear.

pages.title: WING REMOVAL
pages.text: $(o)If you want to remove your wings, however, you'll need a ceremonial knife dipped in dragon's breath. This is... quite painful however.
